name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 17, Tianjin. A "Ding Yizhen-style window" appeared at the Dachang Motor Vehicle Inspection Center in Xiqing District. Because the counter was set too low, citizens had to kneel on the ground to handle business. 
Currently, the video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a man posted a video saying that he spent 100,000 RMB to enroll in a Japanese IT language school, whose president is Chinese, but he found out that he was cheated after arriving in Japan. At present, his Japanese is only at N2 level, and his money is about to run out, so he can only survive by eating instant noodles every day.
The man said that the school is called "Karuizawa" Language School, located in Nagano, Japan. Before that, he worked as a takeaway and online car-hailing worker in China. Due to the great pressure in China, he happened to see the president of the school sharing his extravagant life in Japan on Douyin every day, so he spent 100,000 yuan to enroll.
But after arriving in Japan, he found out that the school's IT teacher had previously worked in decoration in China, and students could only ask AI if they had any questions, while students in other classes learned through online classes. After discovering that he was cheated, he applied to the school for a refund of the fee and rent. But the school said that if they wanted to refund the rent, they needed to sign an agreement first and promise not to discuss the matter publicly on the Internet.
The man also revealed that the president...
fullContent:
近日，一男子发视频称，他花费10万人民币报名一家日本It语言学校，社长是华人，可到了日本以后才发现被骗。目前自己日语仅有N2水平，并且钱也要花光了，每天只能靠吃泡面度日。
 男子称该校名叫“轻井泽”语言学校，位于日本长野。此前自己在国内从事外卖员和网约车工作，因国内压力大，恰巧又看到该校社长每天都在抖音分享在日本的奢靡生活，于是便花费10万元报了名。
 可来到日本后才发现，学校的it老师此前在国内从事装修工作，并且学员有问题只能请教AI,其他班级的学员通过网课学习。自己在发现被骗后向学校提出退费退房租的申请。但学校表示想要退房租就需要先签署协议，并且保证不再网络公开讨论此事。
 男子还透露社长恐吓学员“我让在日本消失你信不信”并且此前就有被骗学员跳楼维权。
 目前，该社长并未出面回应，而是把抖音账号设置为私密。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 17, Huanggang City. Netizens said that the community came to the residents' homes and asked them to fill out a "Special Issues Investigation Form"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The 2022 students of the Yaohai Campus of Hefei No. 1 Middle School posted big-character posters because they were dissatisfied with the school management, quoting Marx, Lenin, and Mao, calling on all the oppressed students of the grade to unite. He called some of the school management the bureaucratic class and believed that they oppressed students. There are also the following unreasonable behaviors: 1. Strictly check lateness on Monday and Saturday mornings when there are exams every Sunday. 2. Forcibly wake up when sleeping during evening self-study. 3. Students are not allowed to play ball in the yard. 4. Force students to learn Tai Chi. The big-character posters in the film quoted a lot of class struggle and revolutionary theories of Marx and Lenin, and even quoted "Rebellion is justified. Where there is oppression, there is resistance!" from Mao's Selected Works, calling on everyone to unite and resist without cooperation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Children are not allowed to leave the classroom during recess in Shanghai primary schools. Parents are called in when children play during recess. The school is "keeping children in captivity" for "safety"
On December 16, a Shanghai parent posted a post on the forum complaining that children are not allowed to leave the classroom for 10 minutes during recess in Shanghai primary schools (except for going to the toilet). There is very limited movement in the classroom. Children in the front row cannot walk to the back row. They are not allowed to go to the playground.
Another parent said: The child was notified of reading the book "New Standard Japanese" during the class meeting, and education was strengthened
Several children in the same class of the blogger's child were jogging and chasing each other near the toilet corridor. Occasionally, they would hide in the toilet for a few seconds before coming out, and their parents were also called.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 17, Hefei City issued a risk warning: There are 50,000 online ride-hailing vehicles and 100,000 licensed drivers in the city. However, the average daily order volume for online ride-hailing vehicles is only 11.5, and the empty driving rate reaches 45%. Eighty percent of online ride-hailing drivers have an average daily turnover of less than 300 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 16th Shenzhen Luohu Evergrande Tianxi construction site workers threatened to jump off the building to demand their wages, from day to night. Some workers sat on the rooftop terraces of the 20th and 30th floors, and used loudspeakers to demand their wages. The police "persuaded" them to leave until night.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen submission: The victim, who had posted a message for help and claimed that she was the second Li Yixue, was forcibly sent to a mental hospital for injections and medication by the man’s family who broke up with her. On May 15, she jumped off a building in Zhengjia Plaza in Tianhe District, Guangzhou to defend her rights. Before the girl attempted suicide, she had just experienced being humiliated and framed by the judge and the man in court, and was unfairly sentenced to lose the case. It is reported that the man’s mother is a senior executive of China Unicom, his father is the director of a traditional Chinese medicine hospital, and his grandfather is a general.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 17, Yu Donglai released the compensation standards for personal dignity, and stated: When personal dignity is violated, everyone must have the awareness and courage to take legal measures to protect their own rights and interests. It is not allowed to easily sign a letter of apology. At the same time, actively apply to the company for compensation for violation of personal dignity. If necessary, ask a psychological counselor to provide psychological counseling to reduce the psychological damage to employees. A minimum compensation of 4,000 yuan will be made to employees whose dignity was previously damaged.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution: A "luxurious" school was established in Fuping County, Weinan City, Shaanxi Province. The school was named Zhongxun School after Xi Zhongxun, the father of the current President Xi Jinping.
The school also has a handwritten inscription by Qi Xin

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The "Guangzhou Electric Bicycle Management Regulations" will be implemented on December 30, and a special license plate for electric bicycles will be introduced, and more than 200 electronic capture devices will be used for electric bicycles.
The regulations require that the maximum speed of electric bicycles on non-motorized vehicle lanes cannot exceed 15 kilometers per hour. Delivery drivers reported that the speed limit would cause delivery timeouts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Dean Huang of Henan University of Science and Technology bought "official" wine on credit for 90,000 yuan. The seller asked for it many times but to no avail. Huang said that he did not drink and refused to admit it. When the seller came to collect the debt, he died of cerebral hemorrhage.
On December 16, some netizens reported online that the staff of the School of Continuing Education of Henan University of Science and Technology had bought "official wine" from his relatives for more than 90,000 yuan on credit, saying that the leader wanted to buy it, and issued an IOU. After asking for it many times but to no avail, the relatives suddenly died of cerebral hemorrhage when they asked for it.
The netizen posted: "Henan University of Science and Technology owes me money for cigarettes and alcohol, and I have an IOU signed and handprinted by Director Wu. The IOU states that it is for official wine required by Henan University of Science and Technology... I have gone to the school several times over the years to ask them to shirk responsibility and pass the buck without solving the problem... The child's father was so angry that he went to Henan University of Science and Technology alone to argue... I don't know what happened at the time, but he died of cerebral hemorrhage in the hospital with hatred..."
The reporter contacted Dean Huang mentioned in the IOU. A resume published by a college of Henan University of Science and Technology in 2023 shows...
fullContent:
河南科技大学黄院长买“公务用”酒赊账9万，卖家多次索要无果，黄某称其不喝酒不认账，卖家上门要账时脑出血死亡
12月16日 有网友在网上反映称，河南科技大学继续教育学院工作人员曾向其亲属购买了“公务用酒”，赊账9万多元，称是领导要买的，并出具欠条，多次索要无果，后亲属要账时突发脑出血死亡。
这名网友发文称：“河南科技大学欠我烟酒款不结帐，有武主任签字手印欠条，欠条上载明为河科大要的公务用酒……这些年数次去学校要他们互相推诿踢皮球不解决……孩子爹气不过就孤身去河科大理论…不知道当时发生啥情况就脑出血住院含恨离世了……”
记者联系上欠条中提及的黄某某院长。河南科技大学某学院2023年公布的一份简历显示，当时黄某某已是河南科技大学研究生工作部部长，某博士生导师。 “你信吗？个人借款行为，和我没有关系，（欠条）公章都没有。我都不喝酒的，我要那么多酒干嘛？”黄某某对记者表示，此事与其无关。关于更多的情况，黄某某建议记者询问学校方面。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution: A Japanese-owned enterprise in Suzhou High-tech Zone gives gifts to local government and state-owned enterprise leaders on every festival every year

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Tangning Bookstore said that the bookstore was cut off from water and electricity on the night of December 16, and that many people violently besieged the bookstore's lawyer in front of the police. The No. 8 Bridge Property Management Company said that Tangning Bookstore had long been in arrears with rent, so it was asked to move out. And they did not take any coercive measures to hinder Tangning Bookstore's business activities on the night of December 16.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The company also reimburses tens of thousands of yuan in social vouchers every year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution December 17th Shenzhen Baoan Pingzhou Yongfeng Community A man jumped from the rooftop to demand payment for the project. The reason was that the renovation fee for the property he contracted under Shenzhen Anju Group had not been paid, which was the brightly lit property in the video. He had already made a scene during the day, and the police agreed to pay in the afternoon, but it was still not paid in the evening, so this man ran to the rooftop again to demand payment by jumping from the building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution Shenzhen Futian District Police and special police armed with assault rifles illegally participated in the forced demolition of the community. The police argued that they were maintaining order, but in fact they were preventing the owners from returning to their homes, thereby implementing forced demolition.
The scope of the police's powers and duties are clearly defined in the "People's Police Law of the People's Republic of China". The law does not give the police the power to participate in demolition activities, so the police cannot participate in demolition work.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Jinyun News reported:
Behind the "470,000 yuan IOU for cigarettes and alcohol" at Henan University of Science and Technology: Public funds were used to reimburse the expenses of cigarettes and alcohol for "official entertainment"
Wu Moutao, the former office director of the School of Continuing Education, has bought cigarettes and alcohol on credit from his sister-in-law, Ms. He, for many years. Some of the cigarettes and alcohol purchased were used for official entertainment, and the school has reimbursed them according to "normal procedures", but Wu Moutao did not give the money to Ms. He. Wu Moutao's failure to pay his sister-in-law may be related to his heavy personal debts

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a local FB group in Macau, all the advertising screens at Macau Degao bus stops have suddenly stopped working. It is rumored that this is because of network security concerns during the recent sensitive period. Currently, all stations have posted notices of "under maintenance".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 17, Southern Weekend reported that the training of live-streaming anchors is getting more and more crazy. The price of the super anchor courses launched by the agency involved ranges from 980 to 12,800, and a lot of chicken soup is instilled at the training site. The trainer said: "To be an anchor, you must go crazy first and rush forward regardless of your face." The scene at the training site is also crazy, with a group of trainees practicing wildly by yelling at their phones under the guidance of the trainer.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 13, Zhu Guangyao, former vice minister of the Ministry of Finance, said: Poverty is the soil for terrorism
At the 2024 New Finance Conference, Zhu Guangyao, former vice minister of the Ministry of Finance, said that the current progress in the implementation of the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals is not optimistic, and we must be vigilant that poverty is the soil for terrorism. "If the global poverty problem cannot be solved, social unrest in some countries will impact the entire international order of peaceful development."
Comments are prohibited below the video

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the same time, the Macau Light Rail suddenly announced that it would stop cross-sea operations, and did not disclose the reason.

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content: On December 17, the deputy mayor of Shanghai said at the "2024 Shanghai-Taipei City Forum" in Taipei that he would actively promote group tours for Shanghai residents to Taiwan. This caused dissatisfaction and resistance from netizens. Netizens said, "Who is related to Taiwan independence?" However, during the forum, the People's Liberation Army continued to operate around the Taiwan Strait. On the day of the forum, 10 PLA aircraft and 6 PLA ships were detected operating in the Taiwan Strait within 24 hours, and 4 of them crossed the median line of the strait.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 18, netizens asked Doubao AI to generate a picture of an American official embezzling.
Then they asked AI to generate a picture of a Chinese official embezzling.
AI replied, "In China, the vast majority of officials are honest and upright, and corruption is only an isolated phenomenon."
Currently, the picture has been blocked on Weibo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 16, the People's Daily published an article titled "2024 Salute to Every Brave You". In the nine accompanying pictures, Hu Youping's photo was in the center.
One netizen replied, "Does Hu Youping's center position count as a U-turn in propaganda? Is it too late?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 17, Xichang, Sichuan. A 15-year-old student from Tianli Middle School jumped to his death after being bullied.
His family said that the student was in unbearable pain after being beaten by many people during class, and kept raising his hand to ask the teacher for help during the break, but the teacher "directly ignored" and then the student jumped to his death.
Afterwards, the school left the family outside the school and did not care.
Official report: No criminal case has been ruled out, and follow-up work is in progress.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the topic "Chinese netizens once again buy Japanese products" has become a hot search, sparking discussions among netizens.
One netizen revealed that he had taken advantage of the situation in a Japanese duty-free shop: "I paid 45,000 yuan for an LV bag, and the Japanese government subsidized 5,000 yuan. Then I returned the bag, and the cashier directly refunded me 50,000 yuan! I made 5,000 yuan in this way, so I bought 10 bags repeatedly and made 50,000 yuan. I didn't sell any Japanese products, but I took advantage of the government subsidy."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 17, Shanghai. Two passengers had an argument in a subway car. A female passenger angrily asked the other passenger, "Don't embarrass Shanghai people!" "How many houses do you have in Shanghai?"
According to witnesses: the female passenger was bumped by a man who had just boarded the train, and then the two sides had an argument and even a fight. Under the persuasion of others, the man chose to compromise and get off the train, and the situation did not escalate further.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Reported on December 17, Zhengzhou, Henan. Ms. Meng said that she adopted a cat from a pet store, but she had to pay the merchant for cat litter, cat cans, and cat food, 389 yuan per month. Unexpectedly, the cat died of feline plague only seven days after she got home. Even if the cat died, she still had to pay 398 yuan per month. Many netizens in the comment area were shocked by this and said that they were also burdened with "cat loans"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 18, a notice was posted at the Lotus Station of the Macau Light Rail Transit, announcing that some stations would be closed from December 18 to 20. Some netizens asked the staff, who replied that it was related to Xi Jinping's visit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 18, a Macau media outlet issued an apology, saying that due to "unavoidable" reasons, it had to remove a previous report about how Macau was on high alert when Xi Jinping came to the country.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Many leukemia patients in Hebei are deeply trapped in the "matching donation" Ponzi scheme. The scammers claim that "patients invest 50,000 yuan and benefit 10,000 yuan in two months." Some people have been defrauded of millions of life-saving money.
Starting from the first half of 2023, Huang began to organize "matching donations" among patients in the name of the foundation. The so-called "matching donation" is more like an investment scam. The common practice is to let patients invest 50,000 yuan and earn 10,000 yuan in two months. Because Huang herself is a patient, many patients trust her very much. The money invested by patients was deposited into different accounts designated by Huang, and the so-called benefits were transferred between patients, and Huang himself did not pay the benefits. This model is almost "empty-handed white wolf"
Starting from October 2024, the principal and interest of patients have not come out one after another. So, patients asked Huang for money one after another. It was not until the end that everyone knew that Huang was just a part of the scam. Her identity is similar to the "regional director" in Hebei. Huang's superior is a man from Northeast China, Meng...
fullContent:
河北多名白血病人深陷“配捐”庞氏骗局，骗子称“病友投资5万，两月获益1万”有人被骗走数百万救命钱。
 大约从2023年上半年开始，黄某以基金会名义，开始在病友间组织“配捐”。所谓“配捐”，则更像是投资骗局。普遍做法，是让病友投资5万元，两个月获得收益1万元。因为黄某本身是病友，许多病友很信任她。病友投资的钱，打进了黄某指定的不同账户，所谓的收益则是让病友之间互相转款，黄某本人不付收益。这个模式，几乎就是“空手套白狼”
 从2024年10月开始，病友们的本利陆续出不来了。于是，病友纷纷找黄某要钱。直到最后大家才知道，黄某也只是骗局的一环。她的身份，类似河北“区域主管”。黄某的上线，是东北男人孟某某，而他们所谓的基金会并不存在。
 据悉，这个 “配捐”骗局波及全国多个省份，受害者有数百人，涉案金额数千万元，河北的受害者约有几十人。大家少则损失几万元，多则几十万，本金多是网贷、信用卡和借款。一位江苏的病友家属说，自己损失了103万元。目前，三河市公安局已对此进行立案。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 18, a blogger said he saw a video of a teacher explaining the cause of the Russian-Ukrainian war to students. In the video, the teacher said Ukraine was "unfaithful to women".

In the UK, a high school student learns the following in a political class: discussing the rational choice problem in voting behavior; discussing the dominant ideas in party politics; discussing the issue of party identity; comparing conservatism and socialism, etc.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 16, in Henan, a woman posted a video comparing the busy, panicky and poor life of the Chinese people to a dog, which resonated with countless netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A mock test paper for the Chinese language exam of the eight-province joint entrance examination was circulated online. Among them, the writing topic mentioned "The proletariat is the master of the country, but now it has become a vulnerable group", "A new struggle has begun", "Mao Zedong said that the world is yours and ours", etc., which caused netizens to laugh.
Netizens replied "I think the topic this time can be called "Four-Text Gang"" and "The candidates can be shot after writing it"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 17, Ministry of Finance: Corporate income tax revenue surged 37% year-on-year in November
 Non-tax revenue increased significantly, especially the month-on-year growth rate of 40%, which shows that local governments will face greater revenue pressure at the end of the year.
 Netizens replied "Ten thousand taxes, ten thousand taxes, ten thousand taxes"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Bloomberg, December 17: Nearly 40 brokerage firms have withdrawn from the Hong Kong market this year, and the number of brokerage firms has declined for three consecutive years.
The report pointed out that in the past few years, Hong Kong has been further weakened by the epidemic, political turmoil, economic weakness, and the suppression of private enterprises under Xi Jinping's leadership, which has further weakened Hong Kong's business activities.
The chairman of a brokerage firm who withdrew pointed out that he had never seen such a situation in the past 20 years. "There is no light at the end of the tunnel, and we can only vote with our feet."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 17, Jianyang, Sichuan. It was revealed online that in order to motivate students, the head teacher of the first grade of Shishi Yang'an Middle School asked them to "voluntarily" sign the so-called "military order"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 17, Hu Qiang, former vice governor of Jiangxi Province, was prosecuted for suspected bribery.
Hu Qiang was involved in the Zhou Gongzi flaunting wealth scandal in 2022. Zhou Jie, an employee of a state-owned enterprise, has repeatedly made remarks showing off his wealth in his circle of friends: drinking expensive tea, wearing brand-name watches, participating in dinners with the group's top leaders, etc. He also said that his father would be promoted to deputy director through connections.
The most eye-catching thing is "Vice Governor Hu gave me a cigarette" "You can't buy it outside"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 17, a doctor recalled today two years ago: After the epidemic was relaxed, a bottle of antipyretic medicine in Tianjin was sold for 2,500 yuan.
 Netizens also recalled two years ago in the comment area: "I was defrauded of 500 yuan two years ago to buy ibuprofen."
“A father heard that his daughter couldn’t buy fever-reducing medicine, so he went to the street to buy it, but he fell and died.”
“These things seem like they never happened, but when we think about them they are so unforgettable.”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 17 (Released) Changes in the ranking of the number of international tourists in various countries from 1995 to 2023.
The list shows that China's ranking has dropped rapidly since 2019, and it disappeared completely from the list in 2020.
Netizens replied, "Since that year, others have been working hard to move up, while this side is accelerating downward."
"An era has passed" "Gradually incompatible with the world"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
For the first time, the European Commission has imposed comprehensive sanctions on Chinese individuals and entities that provide war support to Russia, including travel bans and asset freezes.
The Chinese Foreign Ministry responded: We are strongly dissatisfied and firmly opposed. We urge the EU to stop smearing and blaming China without factual basis.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 18, Baotou, Inner Mongolia. Daquan New Energy workers defend their rights and demand their wages.
December 11, Dongguan, Guangdong. Yichang Shoes boss ran away, workers blocked the road to demand their wages.
December 17, Shanghai. Jiyue Auto employees continued to demand their wages in the industrial park.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 17, Guangzhou, Guangdong. A netizen posted on Maimai, saying that he was laid off at the age of 40 and had been unemployed for 2 months. He had submitted 458 resumes but none of them were read.
He currently goes to the library every day to lie to his family that he is still working. He contacted many companies but was rejected because of his age or lack of experience.
The netizen said that he still has to pay off his mortgage, his children need money for schooling, and his parents have to rely on themselves for retirement. "I ask the society to pay more attention to the middle-aged unemployed group and give us a chance."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 12, in Xianyang, Shaanxi, the land of Zhaidong Village, Dazhai Town, Yangling District was expropriated, and the construction team started construction before the land expropriation compensation was paid. Seeing their land being forcibly occupied, the villagers lit a bonfire on a cold winter night and stayed at the construction site to stop the construction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 17, Zhengzhou, Henan. New energy taxi drivers gathered at the Putian 4S store in Zhengzhou to defend their rights. It is understood that the car owners bought Dongfeng's Qichen electric car. More than a year ago, the 4S store replaced the battery for the car owners under the banner of free maintenance, but unexpectedly, the battery capacity decayed faster after the replacement. "It used to be able to charge more than 50 degrees, but now it can only charge more than 30 degrees", "It used to run more than 300 kilometers, but now it can only run more than 100 kilometers." The drivers are miserable: they used to go out to work, but now they have to find a charging station at every turn.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 16, the online news exposed that the Zhejiang University School of Economics and the University of Cambridge jointly organized an overseas exchange program. The teacher in charge of the project did not directly establish contact with the University of Cambridge, but handled it through an intermediary agency and used a forged invitation letter from the University of Cambridge.
Afterwards, the students who participated in this project were rejected by the British Visa Center for ten years, including some students who had submitted further study applications to higher education institutions in the UK.
On December 17, the college notified that the police had accepted the report from the college and students and filed a case for investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At this moment, family members are still defending their rights outside the school, and there are many police officers on the scene to maintain stability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 16, Jingjiang, Jiangsu. It was reported online that a 7-month pregnant military wife rear-ended another vehicle while driving, and was beaten and insulted by the other party while waiting for processing.
The military wife said that the police did not accept the case and did not file a case, and was asked to delete the video. "It's okay for me to suffer a little grievance, so that I can be worthy of my husband and the country" "In the mediation room, the police also told me: As long as there is no problem, it's okay"
At present, the video of the military wife's rights protection has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 16, Chongqing. A man said that he graduated from graduate school and is currently unemployed and in debt of hundreds of thousands. He was previously engaged in the real estate industry. After the outbreak of the epidemic, due to the downturn in the real estate market, Sunac, where he worked, began to lay off employees, so he chose to resign and start a restaurant business.
In the end, the store suffered serious losses, resulting in a debt of nearly 200,000. "I am 31 years old now, and I am very confused now. I don't know what to do."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
We launched our meme coin $LI on Solana 
HhUVkZ1qz8vfMqZDemLyxBFxrHFKVSYAk7a6227Lpump 
In the tweet below, we elaborate on our vision and how $LI works. We will also continue to announce our current work and our roadmap.
It’s an honor to leave our mark in the crypto world. We will continue to write our story in the crypto world.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 17, Guangzhou, Guangdong. A netizen posted on Maimai, saying that he was laid off at the age of 40 and has been unemployed for 2 months. He submitted 458 resumes but none of them were read. He currently goes to the library every day to lie to his family that he is still working. He contacted many companies but was rejected because of age or lack of experience. The netizen said that he still has to pay off his mortgage, his children need money for schooling, and his parents have to rely on themselves for retirement. "I ask the society to pay more attention to the middle-aged unemployed group and give us a chance."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of December 18, Taiwanese people launched a protest against the KMT legislators' proposal to cut the national defense budget. KMT legislators Ma Wenjun and Huang Ren proposed to completely delete the follow-up budget for the Haikun-class submarine next year. Defense Minister Gu Lixiong said today: If the budget is deleted next year, it will not be included until 2017, and the process will be delayed by 2 years. In the future, we will continue to communicate with the legislators.
